text: int total = 0 ; int tri ( int a [ ] , int index , int row , int lastrow , int sum ) { if ( sum > total ) { total = sum ; } if ( row > lastrow ) { return 0 ; } tri ( a , index + row , row + 1 , lastrow , sum + a [ index ] ) ; if ( ( row * ( row + 1 ) ) / 2 >= index ) { tri ( a , index + row + 1 , row + 1 , lastrow , sum + a [ index ] ) ; } } int main ( ) { int cases , lines , i , j , nos ; scanf ( "%d" , & cases ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < cases ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & lines ) ; nos = ( lines * ( lines + 1 ) ) / 2 ; int a [ nos + 1 ] ; for ( j = 1 ; j <= nos ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ j ] ) ; } tri ( a , 1 , 1 , lines , 0 ) ; printf ( "%d\n" , total ) ; total = 0 ; } return 0 ; }
